mapper.select: select * from auth where 1=1 and userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into user( username, password, uname, isCredentialsNonExpired, isAccountNonExpired, isAccountNonLocked, isEnabled ) values( #{username}, #{password}, #{uname}, #{isCredentialsNonExpired}, #{isAccountNonExpired}, #{isAccountNonLocked}, #{isEnabled} )
